MiningTreasure.1001.2: As sand is brushed away, time stands still.
MiningTreasure.1002.2: Beneath its pure luster lies a heart of utmost sincerity.
MiningTreasure.1003.2: A frozen wave, a silent song of the ocean.
MiningTreasure.2001.2: The most adorable monster crystal in the world.
MiningTreasure.2002.2: A single drop grants understanding of all elvish tongues.
MiningTreasure.2003.2: The bearer of the scepter rides the waves and commands the shark packs.
MiningTreasure.3001.2: Beneath its filthy surface lurks unsettling secrets.
MiningTreasure.3002.2: Is it the source of all disasters or the dawn of supreme glory?
MiningTreasure.3003.2: Lost in the sea of time, it writes an eternal forbidden spell of the unknown.
MiningTreasure.4001.2: Though coarse and heavy, it stands as the sturdiest fortress.
MiningTreasure.4002.2: The moment it sees daylight again, everyone is astonished by its crystalline brilliance.
MiningTreasure.4003.2: Legend says only those who vanquish the dragon are worthy of this extraordinary treasure.
